title: Why i dont have season 8 border
body:
16.01.2018   i being Silver I 
when the season 7 end. Now its season 8 and i dont have border. Why?

replies.body:
I was able to check and it seems like your account does have the Bronze 2 border for Flex SR and the Bronze 1 border for Solo Q. If you aren't able to see them be sure to reference where those borders show, and which one should be showing. 

https://i.gyazo.com/c1fc5e5d05fb292b873a1ccf0129a338.png

Season 7 ended last year in early November. Your preseason ranking does not gain you access to rewards you did not earn by your rank on that date when the last season ended. There is a gap between seasons - any climbing or ranked play during that gap does not gain you anything.
